name: Nanette the Net Netter
description: Follow young Nanette in her search for partnerships and alliances in Iocean! A virus has plagued the world and deprived it of its most important resource: a network of magical fireflies that telepathically linked the minds of all the inhabitants. The only way to cure it is to reconnect every community to the network. Is Nanette going to make it? Oh boy, certainly not by herself!
